book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲥⲟⲧⲡϥ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ ...
English: For at the first she will walk with him by crooked ways, and bring fear and dread upon him, and torment him with her discipline, until she may trust his soul, and try him by her laws.
Greek: ὅτι διεστραµµένως πορεύσεται µετ’ αὐτοῦ ἐν πρώτοις, φόβον καὶ δειλίαν ἐπάξει ἐπ’ αὐτὸν καὶ βασανίσει αὐτὸν ἐν παιδείᾳ αὐτῆς, ἕως οὗ ἐµπιστεύσῃ τῇ ψυχῇ αὐτοῦ, καὶ πειράσει αὐτὸν ἐν τοῖς δικαιώµασιν αὐτῆς·

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲑⲟⲧⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧϭⲱⲃ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲱⲥ .........ⲃⲁⲥⲁⲛⲓⲍⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲥ...
English: Then will she return the straight way unto him, and comfort him, and shew him her secrets.
Greek: καὶ πάλιν ἐπανήξει κατ’ εὐθεῖαν πρὸς αὐτὸν καὶ εὐφρανεῖ αὐτὸν καὶ ἀποκαλύψει αὐτῷ τὰ κρυπτὰ αὐτῆς.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲛⲧⲥ̅ⲧⲁⲛϩⲟⲩⲧⲥ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲥⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϥ....
English: But if he go wrong, she will forsake him, and give him over to his own ruin.
Greek: ἐὰν ἀποπλανηθῇ, ἐγκαταλείψει αὐτὸν καὶ παραδώσει αὐτὸν εἰς χεῖρας πτώσεως αὐτοῦ.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲙⲁϩⲑⲏⲕ ⲉ̀ⲡⲓⲥⲏⲟⲩ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉⲕⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉ̀ⲣⲟⲕ ⲉ̀ⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲁ ⲡⲓⲡⲉⲧϩⲱⲟⲩ ⲟⲩⲟϩ ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣϭⲓϣⲓⲡⲓ ⲉⲑⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲕⲙⲉⲧⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ........... ⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲛⲥ............ ⲛⲉⲥⲡⲉⲑⲏⲡ.
English: Observe the opportunity, and beware of evil; and be not ashamed when it concerneth thy soul.
Greek: Συντήρησον καιρὸν καὶ φύλαξαι ἀπὸ πονηροῦ καὶ περὶ τῆς ψυχῆς σου µὴ αἰσχυνθῇς·

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲟⲩϣⲓⲡⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉ̀ϣⲁϥⲓⲛⲓ ⲙ̀ⲫⲛⲟⲃⲓ ⲟⲩⲟϩ ⲟⲩϣⲓⲡⲓ ⲛ̀ⲟⲩⲱⲟⲩ ⲛⲉⲙ ϩⲙⲟⲧ
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ .... ⲥⲱⲣⲙ̅ .... ⲛϥ̅ⲧⲁⲁϥ .... (ⲕ̅ⲃ̅) (ⲕ̅ⲅ̅) ............................. ⲟⲩϣⲓⲡⲉ ⲉⲩⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ.
English: For there is a shame that bringeth sin; and there is a shame which is glory and grace.
Greek: ἔστιν γὰρ αἰσχύνη ἐπάγουσα ἁµαρτίαν, καὶ ἔστιν αἰσχύνη δόξα καὶ χάρις.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣϭⲓϩⲟ ⲟⲩⲡⲉⲧϩⲱⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉ ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲟⲩⲟϩ ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣϣⲓⲡⲓ ϧⲉⲛ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲉⲓ
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲓϩⲟ ⲉⲩ....ⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲓⲡⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲉ.
English: Accept no person against thy soul, and let not the reverence of any man cause thee to fall.
Greek: µὴ λάβῃς πρόσωπον κατὰ τῆς ψυχῆς σου καὶ µὴ ἐντραπῇς εἰς πτῶσίν σου.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϫⲁⲓ̈:
English: And refrain not to speak, when there is occasion to do good, and hide not thy wisdom in her beauty.
Greek: µὴ κωλύσῃς λόγον ἐν καιρῷ χρείας·

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲉ̀ϣⲁⲩⲥⲟⲩⲉⲛ ϯⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲅⲁⲣ ϧⲉⲛ ⲡⲓⲥⲁϫⲓ ⲟⲩⲟϩ ϯⲙⲉⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ ϧⲉⲛ ⲡⲥⲁϫⲓ ⲙ̀ⲡⲓⲗⲁⲥ
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲁⲩⲥⲟⲩⲛ ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲅⲁⲣ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉⲥⲃⲱ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲁⲥ.
English: For by speech wisdom shall be known: and learning by the word of the tongue.
Greek: ἐν γὰρ λόγῳ γνωσθήσεται σοφία καὶ παιδεία ἐν ῥήµατι γλώσσης.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣϯ ⲟⲩⲃⲉ ϯⲙⲉⲑⲙⲏⲓ ⲟⲩⲟϩ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉⲕϭⲓϣⲓⲡⲓ ⲉⲑⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲕⲙⲉⲧⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲟⲩⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ϫⲓϣⲓⲡⲉ ....
English: In no wise speak against the truth; but be abashed of the error of thine ignorance.
Greek: µὴ ἀντίλεγε τῇ ἀληθείᾳ καὶ περὶ τῆς ἀπαιδευσίας σου ἐντράπηθι.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣϣⲓⲡⲓ ⲉ̀ⲉⲣⲟⲙⲟⲗⲟⲅⲓⲛ ⲛ̀ⲛⲉⲕⲛⲟⲃⲓ ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣⲁⲙⲟⲛⲓ ⲛ̀ⲟⲩⲓⲁⲣⲟ ⲉϥϧⲁϯ
Sahidic: .....ⲟⲙⲟⲗⲟⲅⲉⲓ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲉⲣⲟ ....
English: Be not ashamed to confess thy sins; and force not the course of the river.
Greek: µὴ αἰσχυνθῇς ὁµολογῆσαι ἐφ’ ἁµαρτίαις σου καὶ µὴ βιάζου ῥοῦν ποταµοῦ.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣⲫⲟⲣϣⲕ ⲉ̀ⲃⲟⲗ ϧⲁⲧⲉⲛ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲓ ⲛⲥⲟϫ ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣϭⲓ ⲙ̀ⲡϩⲟ ⲛ̀ⲟⲩϫⲱⲣⲓ
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲡⲟⲣϣⲕ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲁⲧⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ .....: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲓⲫⲟ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ.
English: Make not thyself an underling to a foolish man; neither accept the person of the mighty.
Greek: καὶ µὴ ὑποστρώσῃς ἀνθρώπῳ µωρῷ σεαυτὸν καὶ µὴ λάβῃς πρόσωπον δυνάστου.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ϯ ⲉ̀ϫⲉⲛ ϯⲙⲉⲑⲙⲏⲓ ϣⲁ ⲉ̀ϧⲣⲏⲓ ⲉ̀ⲫⲙⲟⲩ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉ ⲡϭ̅ⲥ̅ ⲫϯ ϯ ⲉ̀ϩⲣⲏⲓ ⲉ̀ϫⲱⲕ
Sahidic: ⲙⲓϣⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲉ ϣⲁ ϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲡⲙⲟⲩ ... ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ....ⲉϫⲱⲕ.
English: Strive for the truth unto death, and the Lord shall fight for thee.
Greek: ἕως θανάτου ἀγώνισαι περὶ τῆς ἀληθείας, καὶ κύριος ὁ θεὸς πολεµήσει ὑπὲρ σοῦ.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣⲉⲣⲣⲉϥⲭⲱⲗⲉⲙ ⲉ̀ⲥⲁϫⲓ ⲉⲕⲟⲩⲱϣϥ ⲉⲕⲃⲏⲗ ⲉ̀ⲃⲟⲗ ϧⲉⲛ ⲛⲉⲕϩⲃⲏⲟⲩⲓ
English: Be not hasty in thy tongue, and in thy deeds slack and remiss.
Greek: µὴ γίνου θρασὺς ἐν γλώσσῃ σου καὶ νωθρὸς καὶ παρειµένος ἐν τοῖς ἔργοις σου.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣϣⲱⲡⲓ ⲙ̀ⲫⲣⲏϯ ⲛ̀ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲩⲓ ϧⲉⲛ ⲡⲉⲕⲏⲓ ⲉⲕⲟⲓ ⲛ̀ⲧⲁⲣⲁϩ ϧⲉⲛ ⲛⲉⲕⲉⲃⲓⲁⲓⲕ
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓⲙⲟⲩⲓ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕⲏⲉⲓ ⲉⲕⲉⲧⲣⲁϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ.
English: Be not as a lion in thy house, nor frantick among thy servants.
Greek: µὴ ἴσθι ὡς λέων ἐν τῷ οἴκῳ σου καὶ φαντασιοκοπῶν ἐν τοῖς οἰκέταις σου.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲛⲑⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲕϫⲓϫ ϣⲱⲡⲓ ⲉⲥⲥⲟⲩⲧⲱⲛ ⲉⲕϭⲓ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉⲕⲥⲟⲕⲥ ⲉ̀ⲣⲟⲕ ⲉⲕⲛⲁϯ
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲕϭⲓϫ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲥⲥⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉϫⲓ ⲛⲅ̅ⲉⲓ ⲉⲕⲛⲁϯ ⲛⲅ̅ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲥ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ.
English: Let not thine hand be stretched out to receive, and shut when thou shouldest repay.
Greek: µὴ ἔστω ἡ χείρ σου ἐκτεταµένη εἰς τὸ λαβεῖν καὶ ἐν τῷ ἀποδιδόναι συνεσταλµένη.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣⲭⲁϩⲑⲏⲕ ⲉ̀ⲛⲓⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣϫⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲥⲉⲣⲱϣⲓ ⲉ̀ⲣⲟⲓ ϧⲉⲛ ⲡⲁⲱⲛϧ
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲁ ϩⲧⲏⲕ ⲉⲛⲉⲕⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲥⲉⲣⲱϣⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲓ̈ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲁⲱⲛϩ̅.
English: Set thy heart upon thy goods; and say not, I have enough for my life.
Greek: Μὴ ἔπεχε ἐπὶ τοῖς χρήµασίν σου καὶ µὴ εἴπῃς Αὐτάρκη µοί ἐστιν.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Bohairic: ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲣⲟⲩⲁϩⲕ ⲛ̀ⲥⲁ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲛⲉⲙ ⲧⲉⲕϫⲟⲙ ⲉ̀ⲑⲣⲉⲕⲙⲟϣⲓ ϧⲉⲛ ⲛⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲁϩⲕ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉⲕϭⲟⲙ.
English: Follow not thine own mind and thy strength, to walk in the ways of thy heart:
Greek: µὴ ἐξακολούθει τῇ ψυχῇ σου καὶ τῇ ἰσχύι σου πορεύεσθαι ἐν ἐπιθυµίαις καρδίας σου·

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϭⲙ̅ϭⲟⲙ ⲉⲣⲟⲓ̈; ⲉⲧⲣⲉⲕⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ: ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲅⲁⲣ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϫⲓⲕⲃⲁ ϥⲛⲁϫⲓⲕⲃⲁ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲕ̅.
English: And say not, Who shall control me for my works? for the Lord will surely revenge thy pride.
Greek: καὶ µὴ εἴπῃς Τίς µε δυναστεύσει; ὁ γὰρ κύριος ἐκδικῶν ἐκδικήσει.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲣⲓⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁ ⲟⲩ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛⲁⲓ̈; ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲟⲩϩⲁⲣϣ̅ ϩⲏⲧ ⲡⲉ.
English: Say not, I have sinned, and what harm hath happened unto me? for the Lord is longsuffering, he will in no wise let thee go.
Greek: µὴ εἴπῃς Ἥµαρτον, καὶ τί µοι ἐγένετο; ὁ γὰρ κύριός ἐστιν µακρόθυµος.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣⲁⲑⲟⲧⲉ ϫⲉ ⲉⲥⲛⲁⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲟⲩⲉϩ ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: Concerning propitiation, be not without fear to add sin unto sin:
Greek: περὶ ἐξιλασµοῦ µὴ ἄφοβος γίνου προσθεῖναι ἁµαρτίαν ἐφ’ ἁµαρτίαις·

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲛⲁϣⲉ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧϣⲁⲛϩⲧⲏϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϥⲛⲁⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: And say not His mercy is great; he will be pacified for the multitude of my sins:
Greek: καὶ µὴ εἴπῃς Ὁ οἰκτιρµὸς αὐτοῦ πολύς, τὸ πλῆθος τῶν ἁµαρτιῶν µου ἐξιλάσεται·

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲛⲁ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϥϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲏⲩ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: for mercy and wrath come from him, and his indignation resteth upon sinners.
Greek: ἔλεος γὰρ καὶ ὀργὴ παρ’ αὐτῷ, καὶ ἐπὶ ἁµαρτωλοὺς καταπαύσει ὁ θυµὸς αὐτοῦ.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲱⲥⲕ ⲉⲕⲉⲧⲕ̅ ⲉⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅.... ⲟⲩϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲟⲩϩⲟⲟⲩ:
English: Make no tarrying to turn to the Lord, and put not off from day to day:
Greek: µὴ ἀνάµενε ἐπιστρέψαι πρὸς κύριον καὶ µὴ ὑπερβάλλου ἡµέραν ἐξ ἡµέρας·

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲏⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲥ̅ⲛⲉ. ⲛⲅ̅ⲛ....
English: for suddenly shall the wrath of the Lord come forth, and in thy security thou shalt be destroyed, and perish in the day of vengeance.
Greek: ἐξάπινα γὰρ ἐξελεύσεται ὀργὴ κυρίου, καὶ ἐν καιρῷ ἐκδικήσεως ἐξολῇ.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲁ ϩⲧⲏⲕ ⲉϩⲉⲛⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲛⲁϯ ϩⲏⲩ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲁⲛ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲗ̅ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲫⲓⲥⲉ.
English: Set not thine heart upon goods unjustly gotten, for they shall not profit thee in the day of calamity.
Greek: Μὴ ἔπεχε ἐπὶ χρήµασιν ἀδίκοις· οὐδὲν γὰρ ὠφελήσει σε ἐν ἡµέρᾳ ἐπαγωγῆς.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲱϣ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲏⲩ ⲛⲓⲙ: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ϩⲓ ϩⲓⲏ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: Winnow not with every wind, and go not into every way: for so doth the sinner that hath a double tongue.
Greek: µὴ λίκµα ἐν παντὶ ἀνέµῳ καὶ µὴ πορεύου ἐν πάσῃ ἀτραπῷ· οὕτως ὁ ἁµαρτωλὸς ὁ δίγλωσσος.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲕⲧⲁϫⲣⲏⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲁϫⲉ ⲙⲁⲣⲉϥϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲟⲩⲁ ⲁⲡⲉ.
English: Be stedfast in thy understanding; and let thy word be the same.
Greek: ἴσθι ἐστηριγµένος ἐν συνέσει σου, καὶ εἷς ἔστω σου ὁ λόγος.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲕϭⲉⲡⲏ ⲉⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ϫⲉ ⲛⲉⲕϣⲁϫⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ.
English: Be swift to hear; and let thy life be sincere; and with patience give answer.
Greek: Γίνου ταχὺς ἐν ἀκροάσει σου καὶ ἐν µακροθυµίᾳ φθέγγου ἀπόκρισιν.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲕ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲁϫⲓⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱⲕ: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲛ ⲕⲁ ⲧⲉⲕϭⲓϫ ⲉⲣⲛ̅ ⲣⲱⲕ.
English: If thou hast understanding, answer thy neighbour; if not, lay thy hand upon thy mouth.
Greek: εἰ ἔστιν σοι σύνεσις, ἀποκρίθητι τῷ πλησίον· εἰ δὲ µή, ἡ χείρ σου ἔστω ἐπὶ τῷ στόµατί σου.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲥⲱϣ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧϭⲓⲛϣⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲗⲁⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϥϩⲉ.
English: Honour and shame is in talk: and the tongue of man is his fall.
Greek: δόξα καὶ ἀτιµία ἐν λαλιᾷ, καὶ γλῶσσα ἀνθρώπου πτῶσις αὐτῷ.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ......ⲙⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ϫⲉ ⲡⲣⲉϥⲕⲁⲥⲕⲥ̅ .....ϭⲱⲣϭ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕⲗⲁⲥ.
English: Be not called a whisperer, and lie not in wait with thy tongue: for a foul shame is upon the thief, and an evil condemnation upon the double tongue.
Greek: Μὴ κληθῇς ψίθυρος καὶ τῇ γλώσσῃ σου µὴ ἐνέδρευε ἐπὶ γὰρ τῷ κλέπτῃ ἐστὶν αἰσχύνη καὶ κατάγνωσις πονηρὰ ἐπὶ διγλώσσου. (15) ἐν µεγάλῳ καὶ ἐν µικρῷ µὴ ἀγνόει καὶ ἀντὶ φίλου µὴ γίνου ἐχθρός·

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ....ⲡⲉⲧϫⲓⲟⲩⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲟⲩϣⲓⲡⲉ .... ⲉⲧϩⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ..... (ⲓ̅ⲏ̅) ........ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲙⲛ̅ ...
English: Be not ignorant of any thing in a great matter or a small.
Greek: ὄνοµα γὰρ πονηρὸν αἰσχύνην καὶ ὄνειδος κληρονοµήσει· οὕτως ὁ ἁµαρτωλὸς ὁ δίγλωσσος.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: .......................: ⲡⲣⲁⲛ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲉϥⲛⲁⲕⲁ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ .... ⲙ̅ⲡϣⲓⲡⲉ ⲛⲙ̅....: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲗ̅ⲗⲁⲥ ⲥⲛⲁⲩ.
English: Instead of a friend become not an enemy; for thereby thou shalt inherit an ill name, shame, and reproach: even so shall a sinner that hath a double tongue.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ............ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ ..... ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲁⲥⲓ .....
English: Extol not thyself in the counsel of thine own heart; that thy soul be not torn in pieces as a bull straying alone.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϭⲱⲱⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲧⲁⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲕⲁⲣⲡⲟⲥ: ⲛⲕ̅ⲕⲁⲁⲕ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓϣⲉ ⲉⲧϣⲟⲩⲱⲟⲩ.
English: Thou shalt eat up thy leaves, and lose thy fruit, and leave thyself as a dry tree.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲉⲥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲧⲁⲕⲉ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲕⲁⲁⲥ ⲛⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϥϫⲁϫⲉ ⲣⲁϣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ.
English: A wicked soul shall destroy him that hath it, and shall make him to be laughed to scorn of his enemies.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲗⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲛⲉⲧⲛⲁⲱϣ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅.
English: Sweet language will multiply friends: and a fairspeaking tongue will increase kind greetings.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓⲉⲓⲣⲏⲛⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ: ⲛⲉⲕⲣⲉϥϫⲓϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲉⲟⲩⲁ ⲛⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ϣⲟ.
English: Be in peace with many: nevertheless have but one counsellor of a thousand.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲕⲛⲁⲕⲁ ⲟⲩϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲕⲁⲁϥ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϩⲓⲥⲉ. ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲧⲁⲛϩⲟⲩⲧⲕ̅ ⲛⲉⲙⲁϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲉⲡⲏ
English: If thou wouldest get a friend, prove him first and be not hasty to credit him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲡⲣⲟⲥ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲛⲛⲉϥϭⲱ ⲛ.. ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲑⲗⲓⲯⲓⲥ.
English: For some man is a friend for his own occasion, and will not abide in the day of thy trouble.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ϣⲃⲏⲣ ... ⲛⲉϥϭⲱⲗⲡ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅...
English: And there is a friend, who being turned to enmity, and strife will discover thy reproach.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ϣⲃⲏⲣ ............ .... ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲕ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ .....
English: Again, some friend is a companion at the table, and will not continue in the day of thy affliction.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ........ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩϥ ......... ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ.
English: But in thy prosperity he will be as thyself, and will be bold over thy servants.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: If thou be brought low, he will be against thee, and will hide himself from thy face.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ............... ⲁⲩⲱ ϯϩⲧⲏⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϣⲃⲉⲉⲣ.
English: Separate thyself from thine enemies, and take heed of thy friends.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲧⲟⲥ ⲟⲩⲛⲁϣⲧⲉ ⲉⲥⲧⲁϫⲣⲏⲩ ⲧⲉ: ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥϩⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁϥϩⲉ ⲉⲩⲁϩⲟ.
English: A faithful friend is a strong defence: and he that hath found such an one hath found a treasure.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲧⲟⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥϣⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲱ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ϣⲓ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲁⲛⲁⲓ̈.
English: Nothing doth countervail a faithful friend, and his excellency is invaluable.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲧⲟⲥ ⲟⲩⲡⲁϩⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲡⲉ: ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲁϩⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: A faithful friend is the medicine of life; and they that fear the Lord shall find him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϣⲁⲩⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧϣⲃⲏⲣ: ϫⲉ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲣⲟϥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱϥ.
English: Whoso feareth the Lord shall direct his friendship aright: for as he is, so shall his neighbour be also.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ϫⲓⲛ ⲧⲉⲕⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲥⲱⲧⲡ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲥⲃⲱ ⲧⲁⲣⲉⲕϩⲉ ⲉⲩⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ϣⲁ ⲧⲉⲕⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ.
English: My son, gather instruction from thy youth up: so shalt thou find wisdom till thine old age.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯ ⲡⲉⲕⲟⲩⲟⲓ̈ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲥⲕⲁⲓ ⲙⲛ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟ: ⲛⲅ̅ϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲥⲕⲁⲣⲡⲟⲥ ⲉⲧⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩⲟⲩ.
English: Come unto her as one that ploweth and soweth, and wait for her good fruits:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲛⲁϣⲡ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲏⲙ ⲛ̅ϩⲓⲥⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲥϩⲱⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲕⲛⲁⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲥϭⲣⲱϭ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲉⲡⲏ.
English: for thou shalt not toil much in labouring about her, but thou shalt eat of her fruits right soon.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲥⲣ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓϩⲱⲃ ⲉⲧⲛⲁϣⲧ̅ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲁⲣⲉ ⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ ϭⲱ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲥ̅.
English: She is very unpleasant to the unlearned: he that is without understanding will not remain with her.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲛⲁϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲱϥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ϫⲓϫⲛⲓⲧ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲙ ................ ⲉⲛⲟϫⲥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: She will lie upon him as a mighty stone of trial; and he will cast her from him ere it be long.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: .....................ⲡⲉⲥⲣⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲩⲟⲛϩ̅ ⲁⲛ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲁϩ.
English: For wisdom is according to her name, and she is not manifest unto many.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲥⲃⲱ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁϣⲟϫⲛⲉ.
English: Give ear, my son, receive my advice, and refuse not my counsel,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯ ⲛⲉⲕⲟⲩⲉⲣⲏⲧⲉ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲛⲉⲥⲡⲁⲓⲇⲉⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲕⲙⲁⲕϩ̅ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲛⲉⲥⲕⲗⲁⲗ.
English: And put thy feet into her fetters, and thy neck into her chain.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁ ⲧⲉⲕⲛⲁϩⲃⲉ ϩⲁⲣⲟⲥ ⲛⲅ̅ϥⲓ ϩⲁⲣⲟⲥ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ⲛⲉⲥⲙⲣ̅ⲣⲉ.
English: Bow down thy shoulder, and bear her, and be not grieved with her bonds.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯ ⲡⲉⲕⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕϭⲟⲙ ⲧⲏⲣⲥ̅ ⲛⲅ̅ϩⲁϩⲉϩ ⲉⲛⲉⲥϩⲓⲟⲟⲩⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕⲛⲟⲙⲧⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲥ̅.
English: Come unto her with thy whole heart, and keep her ways with all thy power.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲟⲧϩⲧ̅ ⲛⲅ̅ϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲛⲁⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲥ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲕⲁⲁⲥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: Search, and seek, and she shall be made known unto thee: and when thou hast got hold of her, let her not go.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲛⲁϩⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲡⲉⲥⲙ̅ⲧⲟⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕϩⲁⲏ ⲛ̅ⲥⲕⲟⲧⲥ̅ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲉⲩⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ.
English: For at the last thou shalt find her rest, and that shall be turned to thy joy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲛⲓⲡⲁⲓⲇⲉⲥ ⲣ̅ϩⲁⲉⲓⲃⲉⲥ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲓⲕⲗⲁⲗ ⲛ̅ⲥⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: Then shall her fetters be a strong defence for thee, and her chains a robe of glory.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲕⲟⲥⲙⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓϫⲱⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ϩⲱⲥ ⲛ̅ϩⲩⲁⲕⲓⲛⲑⲓⲛⲟⲛ ⲛⲉ ⲛⲉⲥⲙⲣ̅ⲣⲉ.
English: For there is a golden ornament upon her, and her bands are purple lace.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲛⲁⲧⲁⲁⲥ ϩⲓⲱⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓⲥⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲁⲗⲟⲥ ⲉϫⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲕⲗⲟⲙ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲗⲏⲗ.
English: Thou shalt put her on as a robe of honour, and shalt put her about thee as a crown of joy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛ ⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲕⲛⲁϫⲓⲥⲃⲱ: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛ ϯ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲕⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ.
English: My son, if thou wilt, thou shalt be taught: and if thou wilt apply thy mind, thou shalt be prudent.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛ....: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛ.... ⲡⲉⲕⲙⲁⲁϫⲉ ⲕⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ.
English: If thou love to hear, thou shalt receive understanding: and if thou bow thine ear, thou shalt be wise,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϩⲉ ⲣⲁⲧⲕ̅ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲟϭⲕ̅ ⲉⲡⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲉⲧ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ.
English: Stand in the multitude of the elders; and cleave unto him that is wise.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲉϣ ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲛⲁ ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲣϩⲟⲓⲙⲓⲁ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲣⲉⲩⲣ̅ ⲡⲉⲕⲃⲟⲗ.
English: Be willing to hear every godly discourse; and let not the parables of understanding escape thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛϩⲉ ⲉⲩⲥⲁⲃⲉ ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ⲕ̅ ⲉⲣⲟϥ: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲕⲟⲩⲉⲣⲏⲧⲉ ϩⲉⲧ ⲧⲡⲛ̅ⲛⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲏⲓ̈.
English: And if thou seest a man of understanding, get thee betimes unto him, and let thy foot wear the steps of his door.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲉⲕⲙⲟⲩⲕⲕ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲟⲩⲉϩⲥⲁϩⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲅ̅ⲙⲉⲗⲉⲧⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛⲓⲙ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ.
English: Let thy mind be upon the ordinances of the Lord and meditate continually in his commandments:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲧⲁϫⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲧⲁⲁϥ ⲛⲁⲕ.
English: he shall establish thine heart, and give thee wisdom at thine owns desire.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁⲧⲁϩⲟⲕ: ⲥⲁϩⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅ ⲧⲁⲣⲉϥⲥⲁϩⲱϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ.
English: Do no evil, so shall no harm come unto thee. (2) Depart from the unjust, and iniquity shall turn away from thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲟ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲧⲗⲟⲟⲙ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲟϩⲥⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁϣϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲕⲱⲃ.
English: My son, sow not upon the furrows of unrighteousness, and thou shalt not reap them sevenfold.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲕⲁⲑⲉⲇⲣⲁ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣ̅ⲣⲟ.
English: Seek not of the Lord preeminence, neither of the king the seat of honour.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲙⲁⲓ̈ⲟⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ..........
English: justify not thyself before the Lord; and boast not of thy wisdom before the king.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Seek not to be judge, being not able to take away iniquity;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ...... ...... ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲉⲡⲉⲕ....
English: lest at any time thou fear the person of the mighty, an stumblingblock in the way of thy uprightness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲉⲡⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ .......................
English: Offend not against the multitude of a city, and then thou shalt not cast thyself down among the people.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲟⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲡ ⲥⲛⲁⲩ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲛⲁ....
English: Bind not one sin upon another; for in one thou shalt not be unpunished.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲟ ...... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲓ̈ϣⲁⲛ...... ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ϥⲛⲁϫⲓⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅....
English: Say not, God will look upon the multitude of my oblations, and when I offer to the most high God, he will accept it.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲗⲏⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ......ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲁ.
English: Be not fainthearted when thou makest thy prayer, and neglect not to give alms.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Laugh no man to scorn in the bitterness of his soul: for there is one which humbleth and exalteth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲥⲕⲁⲓ ϭⲟⲗ ⲉⲡⲉⲕⲥⲟⲛ ⲟⲩⲇⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϣⲃⲏⲣ.
English: Devise not a lie against thy brother; neither do the like to thy friend.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲉϫⲓϭⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ......ϭⲟⲗ ........ ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩϥ ⲁⲛ.
English: Use not to make any manner of lie: for the custom thereof is not good.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Use not many words in a multitude of elders, and make not much babbling when thou prayest.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Hate not laborious work, neither husbandry, which the most High hath ordained.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Number not thyself among the multitude of sinners, but remember that wrath will not tarry long.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Humble thyself greatly: for the vengeance of the ungodly is fire and worms.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Change not a friend for any good by no means; neither a faithful brother for the gold of Ophir.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Forego not a wise and good woman: for her grace is above gold.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: (ⲕ̅ⲁ̅) ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅..... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩϫⲁⲓ̈ ⲃⲉⲕⲉ ⲉϥϯ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ.
English: Whereas thy servant worketh truly, entreat him not evil. nor the hireling that bestoweth himself wholly for thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Let thy soul love a good servant, and defraud him not of liberty.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲧⲕ̅.... ⲁⲩⲱ ..ϣⲁⲛ.....
English: Hast thou cattle? have an eye to them: and if they be for thy profit, keep them with thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲧⲕ̅ ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲩ; ....ϯⲥⲃⲱ ⲛⲁⲩ: ⲕⲱⲗϫ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲙⲁⲕϩ̅ ϫⲓⲛ ⲧⲉⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈.
English: Hast thou children? instruct them, and bow down their neck from their youth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲧⲕ ϣⲉⲉⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲩ; ϯϩⲧⲏⲕ ⲉⲡⲉⲩⲥⲱⲙⲁ. ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅..... ⲉⲡⲉⲕϩⲟ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ....
English: Hast thou daughters? have a care of their body, and shew not thyself cheerful toward them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ... ⲧⲉⲕϣⲉⲉⲣⲉ ⲧⲁⲣⲉⲕ.... ......ϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲣ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ. ...........ⲟⲩⲙⲉⲥ...
English: Marry thy daughter, and so shalt thou have performed a weighty matter: but give her to a man of understanding.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: .... ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲙ̅..... ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲛⲟϫⲥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: Hast thou a wife after thy mind? forsake her not: but give not thyself over to a light woman.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲧⲏⲣϥ̅ ϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲉⲓⲱⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲁⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲙⲁⲁⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲱⲃϣ̅.
English: Honour thy father with thy whole heart, and forget not the sorrows of thy mother.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓ ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲃⲗ̅ⲗⲁⲩ ⲛⲉⲕⲛⲁϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲁⲛ ⲡⲉ: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲅⲛⲁϯ ⲟⲩ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩϯ ⲛⲁⲕ:
English: Remember that thou wast begotten of them; and how canst thou recompense them the things that they have done for thee?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲧⲏⲣⲥ̅ ⲁⲣⲓϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲟⲩⲏⲏⲃ.
English: Fear the Lord with all thy soul, and reverence his priests.
